dublin_core.dcvalue: Germany s clinical HIV research efforts are underrepresented on an international level This deficit is primarily due to a lack of clinical studies involving patients from across the country and the fact that no national patient cohort system exists in Germany which could provide a basis for such clinical studies The competence network HIV AIDS is filling this shortcoming by serving as a comprehensive nationwide research alliance The establishment of a patient cohort is linked to 20 projects The success of this new structure is becoming visible
[HIV/AIDS competence network research group presents first results].
